mapper.insert: insert into project_detail (video, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, content, images,others) values (#{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},NOW(), #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{others,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
